Title: All the Time in the World
Plot: Pete, Myka, and Charlotte must track down Sutton, the only man who knows where they can find Paracelsus and exchange the Philosopher's Stone for the stele that will free Claudia from her bronze imprisonment... before she disintegrates.
GuestStars: Polly Walker, Anthony Head, James Marsters, Kelly Hu, Faran Tahir, Josh Blaylock, CCH Pounder
